programme.title: Zoo S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: Abe and Dariela ponder over making a deal that will betray their friends. Abigail's game of cat and mouse continues. Clementine's past catches up to her.

programme.title: The Strangest Weather On Earth S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Series explores a range of fascinating weather events. Meet the eyewitnesses caught up in extraordinary events and discover the science behind these bizarre phenomena.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 39
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: World's Funniest Videos: Top 10 Countdown S2b - EP 6
programme.desc: Funny real-life moments captured on video are presented in this countdown clip show.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 90
programme.desc: (Encore) For her birthday show, Ellen welcomes Justin Bieber for an exclusive talk show interview, Tanya Tucker and Brandi Carlile perform "Hard Luck" off Tanya's CD, "While I'm Livin'".

programme.title: Odd Squad S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Odd Squad is a high-tech agency run by kids equipped with the world's most advanced and unpredictable gadgetry. The agents investigate weird and unusual phenomena around them and use math to put things right.

programme.title: Lexi & Lottie - EP 18
programme.desc: Being identical twin sisters is an asset for 12-year-old detectives Lexi and Lottie, especially when it comes to cracking crimes in their home town of Appleton and its Animal Park. With their pet mouse which has a nose for clues, and their smart comic journalist friend Fred, the friends set about to solving crimes in their local neighborhood!

programme.title: Dot - EP 47
programme.desc: Dot is an 8-year old inquisitive and exuberant tech-savvy girl who launches herself into adventures and fearlessly sets about solving problems by making mistakes and laughing even more along the way.

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 21
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and stakes are high, ten-year-old Rusty Rivets, along with his best friend, Ruby invents his way out of every jam by re-purposing parts and objects into the coolest contraption ever.

programme.title: Bing - EP 49
programme.desc: Just when Bing Bunny thinks he's got the hang of life, it can swing right back and knock him over, but it's ok It's a Bing Thing! And, Flop is there to help guide Bing through the everyday ups and downs of being a pre-schooler.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S22 - EP 7
programme.desc: In this brand new version of the beloved series, Thomas travels full steam ahead across five continents, discovering magnificent new sights and experiencing exciting places and cultures.

programme.title: Astroblast - EP 47
programme.desc: The coolest crew in the galaxy and the stars of the show; Comet, Halley, Sputnik, Radar and Jet are co-workers at the Frosty Star smoothie shop and the best of friends. Sure they are different, sure they make mistakes but through it all, the Astroblast family embraces their differences, makes new friends and discovers that working together makes everything better.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze hop on Bibi's new carpet and go on a magic flying carpet adventure around the world - meeting friends from Africa, Antarctica and Australia.

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 21
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and stakes are high, ten-year-old Rusty Rivets, along with his best friend, Ruby invents his way out of every jam by re-purposing parts and objects into the coolest contraption ever.

programme.title: Shimmer And Shine S2 - EP 15
programme.desc: From unexpected dinosaur pets and dragon guests to surprise treasure hunts and beyond, hilarious magical adventures are never far away with the two genies-in-training and three wishes a day.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 40
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Justine's Flavors Of Fuji - EP 7
programme.desc: In an area filled with an extraordinary amount of tradition and culture, Justine meets local artisans and producers, visits amazing places and learns time-honoured cooking methods. Under the watchful eye of Fuji-san Justine will share dishes inspired by the journey and the produce that makes Shizuoka such a unique place... in such a unique country. Along the way Justine will learn the secrets to making soba noodles, Japanese sweets known as Wagashi and authentic soy sauce.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S37 - EP 7028
programme.desc: (Encore) This game show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Kin - EP 408
programme.desc: Louis launches the HAILr project but it backfires due to Lisa Flamingo's shady past. Ajay invites Kenneth to a dating event, but he overshadows Kenneth during the event instead. Matthew proves to the Shelleys that he might be their best option to get Ah Yoke back on her feet.

programme.title: My Sassy Neighbour - EP 4
programme.desc: Madam Tan helps a lonely and hawker food craving Makcik enjoy life again. Makcik's over protective son keeps her a virtual prisoner at home because he's concerned about her health. She's bored to death until Madam Tan helps her break free. Xuan, Madam Tan's shy and single daughter, gets her hopes up when she meets Gordon, the dashing Community TV host, at the provision shop and he gives her his number.

programme.title: Talking Point - EP 9
programme.desc: (Encore) Singapore's 2-month long Circuit Breaker has come to an end. But life as we know it, is far from getting back to normal. When can we get our lives back?

programme.title: Odd Squad S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Odd Squad is a high-tech agency run by kids equipped with the world's most advanced and unpredictable gadgetry. The agents investigate weird and unusual phenomena around them and use math to put things right.

programme.title: Lexi & Lottie - EP 18
programme.desc: Being identical twin sisters is an asset for 12-year-old detectives Lexi and Lottie, especially when it comes to cracking crimes in their home town of Appleton and its Animal Park. With their pet mouse which has a nose for clues, and their smart comic journalist friend Fred, the friends set about to solving crimes in their local neighborhood!

programme.title: OddBods S2 - EP 25
programme.desc: The Oddbods are back! Watch 7 friends survive the perils of everyday life, where ordinary situations spiral into extraordinary events. A non-dialogue comedy that captures the madcap yet charming antics of the Oddbods - celebrating success where they can find it and taking failure in their stride.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S9 - EP 8
programme.desc: This series follows a pony named Twilight Sparkle as she learns about friendship in the town of Ponyville with her friends.The ponies share adventures and help other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendship.

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven - EP 51
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.title: Upside Down - EP 18
programme.desc: A mysterious lady falls into the ice cream parlour and leaves everyone in shock. When she finally regains consciousness she tries to speak but has lost her voice. A comedy of errors ensues when the crew mistakes her charades for unique typhoon coming their way. They panic and call their parents to the cafe and lock themselves in the cafe.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 19 - EP 8
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: A young woman discovers her destiny as an heiress of intergalactic nobility and must fight to protect the inhabitants of Earth from an ancient and destructive industry.

programme.title: News 5 - EP 64
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: On the Red Dot - COVID-19: Alone. Together. - EP 9
programme.desc: What are religious leaders doing when their house of worship is shut down as COVID-19 threatens their followers? How can they make sure that they don't lose faith during the COVID-19 crisis?

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest.

programme.title: The Sound Of Music (Live Stage Play)
programme.desc: The Sound of Music is a special three-hour performance live from New York, which pays homage to the original Broadway musical stage production.

programme.title: Arts 21 - EP 141
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 140
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 40
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Justine's Flavors Of Fuji - EP 7
programme.desc: In an area filled with an extraordinary amount of tradition and culture, Justine meets local artisans and producers, visits amazing places and learns time-honoured cooking methods. Under the watchful eye of Fuji-san Justine will share dishes inspired by the journey and the produce that makes Shizuoka such a unique place... in such a unique country. Along the way Justine will learn the secrets to making soba noodles, Japanese sweets known as Wagashi and authentic soy sauce.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 91
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Hoda Kotb ("Today") and Alicia Keys. Alicia performs her new single "Underdog".

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2 - EP 16
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabets are P and R. Princess Po and Prince Ra are visiting our space station. Please be sure to welcome them warmly!

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 21
programme.desc: A common tree frog hops into the garden one wet and rainy day. Leo, Katie and Hero take the frog to the forest, where Ranger Rocky directs them to find the frog's breeding ground. A young California Sea Lion makes a surprise appearance during Leo's basketball game. Later, a voyage to find the sea lion's home turns into a daring rescue on the high seas.

programme.title: Tree Fu Tom S3 - EP 10
programme.desc: A fantasy, action-adventure series which follows the amazing adventures of a young boy, Tom.

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin S6 - EP 13
programme.desc: Pororo, the mischievous penguin lives in a village on a far far away island with his unlikely friends. No one knows how they ended up on the island, but they've got to stick together and make the best of it.

programme.title: Sesame Street S46 - EP 1
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Sesame Street S46 - EP 2
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Super Wings S4: Super Charge - EP 37
programme.desc: Jett, the adorable little red plane, continues his adventures and missions all around the world!

programme.title: Tangled: The Series Yr 1 - EP 25
programme.desc: This adventure-comedy series unfolds as Rapunzel acquaints herself with her parents, her kingdom and the people of Corona.

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends S22 - EP 6
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots Academy S1 - EP 35
programme.desc: Five young recruits from Cybertron train to be rescue bots at The Rescue Bots Academy on Earth. Hot Shot, Whirl, Hoist, Medix and Wedge learn the value of teamwork, courage and friendship as they pass simulated and real rescue challenges. Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S6 - Skybound - EP 3
programme.desc: With the defeat of Morro's ghost invasion, the ninja have now become huge media celebrities. But dark forces once more threaten NINJAGO Island as the Teapot of Tyrahn is rediscovered by the ghost of Clouse, Master Chen's former right-hand man. He allows Nadakhan, an evil Djinn and captain of the infamous Misfortunes Keep, to escape the teapot. Nadakhan takes to the skies with the Sky Pirates and prepares to attack.

programme.title: Big Big Kampung - EP 7
programme.desc: BIG, BIG KAMPUNG! pits young okto viewers in matches that involves supersized kampung games! Pick-Up Sticks the size of bamboo poles! Five-Stones the size of sofa cushions! And mattress-sized eraser challenge! Each week, two teams of four challenge each other in three different games of supersized kampung-styled games. Winning teams will return to face-off until the last team standing emerges victorious to claim the title of Big, Big Kampung Superchampion!

programme.title: Worst Cooks In America S9 - Celebrity Edition - EP 1
programme.desc: Rachael Ray returns with Anne Burrell to host season 2 of the Celebrity Edition. The winner earns a $50,000 donation for their chosen charity.

programme.title: Chaos Caught On Camera - EP 6
programme.desc: Caught On Camera unlocks the stories behind some of the most compelling, shocking, remarkable and epic footage ever captured by people in the middle of these real-life disaster movies.

programme.title: The Strangest Weather On Earth S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Series explores a range of fascinating weather events. Meet the eyewitnesses caught up in extraordinary events and discover the science behind these bizarre phenomena.

programme.title: One Wild Day - EP 2
programme.desc: This fresh, modern landmark natural history series is a 24-hour roller coaster through the wild. Meet extraordinary animals as they thrive at different moments in the day to survive in some of the toughest landscapes on the planet.

programme.title: The ZhuZhus - EP 9
programme.desc: The ZhuZhuPets are no ordinary pets, they are EXTRAORDINARY and they can talk! Always on a quest for fun, they have to stay on their tiny toes to keep up with the non-stop action, laughs and adventures.

programme.title: Big Hero 6: The Series Yr 1 - EP 12
programme.desc: Based on Walt Disney Animation Studios Oscar-winning feature film.

programme.title: Power Rangers Ninja Steel - EP 10
programme.desc: A new team of superhuman power rangers must work together and use their new ninja powers to prevent evil from dominating the human race and from destroying the planet earth and the universe.

programme.title: Transformers Robots In Disguise S4 - EP 23
programme.desc: An animated series set years after Transformers: Prime, it follows Bumblebee as he leads a ragtag group of Autobots back to Earth when Decepticons crash land on the planet.

programme.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard - EP 48
programme.desc: The new season embarks on a new story with Aichi and Kai returning to take up the helm as the main protagonists. Many beloved characters such as Misaki Tokura, Kamui Katsuragi and Ren Suzugamori appear as well.

programme.title: Museum Mysteries - EP 6
programme.desc: Time-travelling historian and explorer extraordinaire, Captain Mer Lai En, is on a quest to recruit crew members to join him on his artefact collecting missions all around the world and all across time! Not only do crew members have to help solve all of the Captain's challenges and puzzles in his museum, they must also help Captain Mer Lai En fix the time-machine's flux chronometer. Will they succeed? Find out in Museum Mysteries!

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 650
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Stronger As One
programme.desc: (Encore) Join Joanna Dong and the Singapore Symphony Choruses in a song of hope in this 15-minute special as Singapore continues its fight against Covid-19. Ordinary people also share their experiences of these extraordinary times, and show that by pulling together, Singapore is Stronger as One.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

programme.title: News 5 - EP 65
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Revealing archives and real footages of the meteorological phenomena, witness some of the most deadly natural disasters the planet has ever seen.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut 2: Ghosts Of Georgia
programme.desc: A young family moves into a historic home in Georgia, only to learn they are not the house's only inhabitants. Soon they find themselves in the presence of a secret rising from underground and threatening to bring down anyone in its path.

programme.title: The Resident - EP 1
programme.desc: THE RESIDENT is a powerful new medical show focusing on a young doctor's final years of training that rips back the curtain to reveal the truth of what really happens, both good and bad, in hospitals across the country.

programme.title: Jamestown S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Young women looking for a better life arrive in the English colony of Jamestown in 1619, where they are duty bound to be married to the early Virginian settlers.

programme.title: The Good Doctor - EP 3

programme.title: The Brave - EP 3

The Junior Rangers go to the rainforest to find a new home for a goliath birdeater spider. But can the Junior Rangers scare off a pair of weasels who are preying on their eight-legged friend?

programme.title: Tree Fu Tom S3 - EP 11

programme.title: Sesame Street S46 - EP 3

programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Kody Kapow S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Sonic Boom S2 - EP 17

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: He is big as a bear, strong as a bear, smart... as a bear. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest his bears privilege. That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists - the lemmings.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S6 - Skybound - EP 4
programme.desc: With the defeat of Morro's ghost invasion, the ninja have now become huge media celebrities. But dark forces once more threaten NINJAGO Island as the Teapot of Tyrahn is rediscovered by the ghost of Clouse, Master Chen's former right-hand man. He allows Nadakhan, an evil Djinn and captain of the infamous Misfortunes Keep, to escape the teapot. Nadakhan takes to the skies with the Sky Pirates and prepares to attack.

programme.title: Word Whiz Or Slime Pit S2 - EP 8

Our specialist in studio will also help us kick-start the road to a healthy lifestyle.

The detective (Louis Koo) in charge sees through Shun's scheme but decides to play along so as to capture his whole gang once and for all. (PG13 - 暴力镜头).

programme.title: 甘榜情 Kampong Ties - EP 29
programme.desc: (R) Xiuyuan is about to get married to Duck Bing and goes to the temple to mock at the Gods for giving her a bad marriage lot years ago. On the eve of the wedding, Juncai unexpectedly escapes back to the kampong to confront Xiuyuan for sending him to a god-forsaken place. In his anger, he beats her to death. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)秀圆即将和鸭肉炳结婚，态度嚣张地跑到庙里，嘲笑当年她索求的姻缘签根本不灵，却没料到在结婚前夕，君材突然从婆罗洲潜逃回来。他怒责秀圆将他送到矿区过非人生活，在愤恨之下将恶毒的秀圆打死。.

programme.title: 甘榜情 Kampong Ties - EP 30
programme.desc: (R) Weinan finally appears at Tianshi's wake. Weinan has become a lawyer and he returns to the kampong to help Youbao re-open his case. Will Youbao be freed? Will he and Yueman be together at last? What will happen to the ill-stricken Shuixian? (大结局)(重)天狮的丧礼上，伟南终于出现，与月满两人母子相见，不禁抱头痛哭。伟南已经成了律师，这次回来就是要为友宝翻案。友宝会被释放吗？他和月满有情人是否会成眷属，一身是病的水仙又会如何？请看大结局。.

programme.title: 国记交意所 S3 It's A Small World S3 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) This award-winning studio-based talkshow returns for a 3rd season. Mark Lee, together with a group of foreign "students" engage in a lively discussion on different social issues. (重).

programme.title: 罪案心理小组X Visible Lies - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Xu Lang deduces that Tang Tianli had an affair when he was alive and hotel staff Bai Xiaoping was his mistress. Xiaoping admits to plotting Tang Tianli's death as she could no longer tolerate his abusive behavior. Xu Lang is of the opinion that Xiaoping was influenced by a third party. (PG13-画面令人不安)(重)徐朗推断唐天里生前有婚外情，而在酒店上班的白小萍就是他的情人。白小萍承认是唐天里的情人，长期受他虐待，在忍无可忍的情况下才对唐天里下毒手。虽然白小萍承认干案，但徐朗认为白小萍是被人教唆的。.

programme.title: 烈火如歌 The Flame's Daughter - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Ruge used her internal qi to heal Yu Zihan, whose death was imminent. A banquet was held to celebrate the return of Yin Xue but the real purpose was to let Yin Xue treat Yu Zihan's illness . (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)烈如歌用自己的内力替玉自寒疗伤，他的死亡迫在眉睫。皇上举行宴会庆祝银雪的回归， 目的是请银雪为玉自寒诊病。.

programme.title: 烈火如歌 The Flame's Daughter - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Yu Zihan vomited blood outside the hall after seeing Yin Xue . Ruge broke into Yin Xue's chamber and questioned Yin Xue. Yin Xue told Ruge that Yu Zihan has contracted the Chill Spell. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)玉自寒见完银雪后，在大殿外吐血。如歌闯进银雪寝殿，质问银雪，银雪才说玉自寒中了寒咒。.

programme.title: 美差事 苦差事 Behind Every Job - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) "Dirty Job" Waste Disposal vs "Glamorous Job" Cooking Oil Recycling. Do you know that Singapore produces seven tons of refuse everyday and half of it gets sent to NEA's incineration plant to be incinerated? If you think the smell from everyday refuse is foul, the smell at the plant is 100 times worse! Although the job of recycling cooking oil might sound cushier than waste incineration, it is definitely not for people who detest an oily and dirty working environment. (重)吃力不讨好的工作是否就你心中所谓的苦差事？每天穿美美上班是否就是你心中的美差事？最佳拍挡李国煌和王禄江将各别体验所谓的美和苦差事，呈现出各行各业辛苦和美好的一面。.

Faced with such fierce competition, can the squabbling Luo siblings bring the family business back to life and put their own lives in order? (重).

programme.title: 数学荒岛历险记 S4 Math's Island S4 - EP 19
programme.desc: In this new series, Luke and his buddies met a new friend, CODEMAO. They help the residents of the town to solve their problems using the power of programming and mathematics, and the use of intelligence technology changes their lives. 在这新系列,故事讲述罗克和小伙伴们遇到了新的朋友编程猫，大家一起帮助小镇的居民们，使用编程和数学的力量解决问题，让小镇越来越智能化，智能科技改变了人们的生活。.

programme.title: 玩具不插电 Toys Unplugged - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, the hosts introduce the nostalgic snake and ladder game. They challenge themselves to the thrilling high-altitude activities at Sentosa. They learn from a toy manufacturer about the process of making toys and also demonstrate how to make the fun and simple ping pong basketball game. (重)这一集，主持人介绍的怀旧游戏是蛇棋。接着，他们前往圣淘沙，挑战惊险刺激的高空探险活动！另外，主持人也拜访玩具制造商，了解玩具生产得经过哪些步骤。最后，他们将教导观众，如何制作简单好玩的乒乓球投篮游戏！.

programme.title: 心。愿 The Wish - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) 10 years ago, Effendy Idris lost his career and independence to a life-threatening heart condition. He is now forced to rely on a special machine to stay alive. All he yearns for is to spend more quality time with his loved ones, and a job that allows him to improve the family's finances. Will his wishes be fulfilled? (重)十一年前，而凡迪因威胁生命的心脏疾病而失去了职业和独立性。 现在，他被迫依靠一台特殊的机器生存。 他只想要与家人共度美好时光，还有一份让他能够改善家人的财务状况的工作。 他的愿望会成真吗？.

programme.title: 宅星刀叉战 #StayHomeCookOff - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Comedian Ho Ai Ling faced off showbiz newbie, KeLe this week. (重)古灵精怪的鬼马艺人宅在家也能宅出欢乐和精彩！本集节目由开心果何爱玲PK能歌善舞的阳光可乐，要挑战的主题是“蛋豆腐”。面对柔软易碎的蛋豆腐，她们会如何接招，煮出色香味俱全的宅星料理呢？现场笑料不断、状况百出，到底谁更厉害？节目中见分晓！.

programme.title: 星光灿烂 The Glittering Days - EP 14

programme.title: 锦衣之下 Under The Power - EP 6
programme.desc: Xie Xiao manages to steal Yuan Jinxia's token when Jinxia is not paying attention. He disguises himself as Lu Yi's subordinate to get into the prison, in an attempt to break a prisoner out of jail. (PG)谢霄趁着袁今夏不注意，偷换了她身上的制牌，随后乔装成陆绎的手下进入牢房劫囚。.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 34
programme.desc: (R) To prevent Gao Ze from getting the famed military strategy book, Li Quan asks his daughter, Feiyan, to bring it to Zhao Zilong. Meantime, Gongsun Baoyue arrives in Chang Shan County to look for Zilong. (PG)(重)为了防止高则取得乐豫百战术，李全差女儿飞燕，将兵书送交身在常山郡的赵子龙。与此同时，公孙宝月来到了常山郡，以寻找失去联系的子龙。.

programme.title: 爱玩客之移动厨房 2019 IWalker - Moving Kitchen 2019 - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Follow Li Yi and Yan Yong Lie as they embark on a tour round Taiwan whipping up yummy cuisines and hearty desserts. (重)永烈及何美化身菜鸟美食记者，探访嘉义当地美食。百年老字号东市场，大家都推荐什么美食？牛杂汤、羊肉汤还有网丝肉卷最受欢迎。嘉义人独特的凉面吃法，竟然一定要加美乃滋？！当地人的古早味下午茶，传承自总铺师手艺的鲁熟肉；砂锅鱼头除了远近驰名林聪明，还有这间当地人也激推！跟着美食记者脚步，挖掘出独一无二的嘉义道地美味。.

programme.title: 你也可以是天使3 You Can Be An Angel 3 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) With lack of proper care and treatment, Ming Zhong suffers temporary loss of vision and his leg wound severely festers, leading to a possible amputation. Ming Zhong is agitated when he finds out the news; Yu Tian feels heavy-hearted. When Li Lian is working in the ward, Ming Zhong recognizes her voice. He did not expect Li Lian, Yu Tian and Yao Yang to work in the same hospital. Li Lian reminds him not to forget about their promise. (PG)(重)明忠因为没有护理，导致眼睛暂时看不见，脚部伤口溃烂严重，可能需要截肢。明忠闻言情绪激动，雨恬心情沉重。丽莲进来病房工作，明忠认出她的声音，没想到丽莲与雨恬姐弟竟然在同一家医院工作。丽莲提醒明忠不要忘了与她的约定。.

programme.title: Hello Singapore - EP 51

programme.title: 她她她的少女時代 Girlie Days - EP 6
programme.desc: (Part 1) Yingfeng finds Dawen's birth certificate unwittingly and discovers that Dawen is her idol Gao Haoyu. Dawen becomes evasive when Yingfeng questions him. (PG)(第6集上)迎风无意中发现大文的出世纸，发现大文竟是偶像高浩宇。迎风质问大文，大文三缄其口。.

programme.title: 宅星刀叉战 #StayHomeCookOff - EP 6
programme.desc: In this finale episode, cool dad Darren Lim challenges tiger mum Lina Ng. Both have known each other for more than 20 years. Who will out-perform the other in their first-ever cooking challenge using potatoes as the main ingredient? Stay tuned. (最后一集)最后一集《宅星刀叉战》邀请到好爸爸林明伦和好妈妈黄嫊方，认识20多年的老朋友，第一次PK厨艺，非常令人期待！他们将以“马铃薯”为主题进行挑战。嫊方带来的是一道大人小孩都爱吃的西式料理，而明伦呈献的是一道香辣够味的中式料理。这场东西方的对决谁将更胜一筹？你一定要看！.

programme.title: 阿贤逛巴刹 Jason's Market Trails S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Host Jason Yeoh explores food markets and street stalls around Malaysia and delves into the human tales and history behind each tasty bite. 跟随阿贤的脚步逛巴刹，在老味道里追寻新的生命力。节目将纪录全马各地巴刹的老滋味，以感受劳动民众一天最早甦醒的好时光。.

programme.title: 天空之城 SKY Castle - EP 5
programme.desc: Xiulin attends the book club for the first time and has a heated argument with Minhe. In an attempt to uphold his ego, Minhe wants the residents to vote for the future of book club. Only 4 residents vote to continue with the book club. Minhe is upset and vents his frustrations on his sons. (PG)秀林第一次参加读书会就顶撞民赫。民赫为了捍卫自尊，提议众人投票决定读书会的将来。投票当天只有4人投票赞成继续举办读书会。读书会正式解散，民赫的面子挂不住，将气出在儿子们的身上。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight - EP 69
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 寻花探草 Sr 2 Garden Of Treasure S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: The focus of the second season of "Garden Of Treasure" include gastrointestinal care, treatment for wound inflammation, hair care, reducing cough and fever symptoms, and care for gynecological issues, so that the audience can more harness the use of herbal medicine. 寻花探草”第二季以寻常病症作为主打，包括肠胃护理、外伤消炎、护发补益、止咳退烧、到妇科调理，让观众能更具体掌握草药的治疗用途。.

programme.title: 锦衣之下 Under The Power - EP 7
programme.desc: Yang Zhou government loses one hundred thousand teals of silver that has been allocated for the river works. Zhou Xianyi, the key holder, becomes the prime suspect. A decree is issued to Lu Yi to investigate. (PG-些许暴力画面)扬州官府银库内十万两修河款不知所踪，而持有钥匙的周显已便成了最大的嫌疑人。朝中下旨，命陆绎追查十万两修河款的去向。.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 35
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Zilong suspects that Xiahou Jie, who pretends to be nice to him, is responsible for his parents' deaths. As Zilong refuses to reveal where the military strategy book is, Xiahou Jie decides to kill him. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)赵子龙怀疑，对他好生款待的夏侯杰，即是杀害其父母的凶手。由于子龙一直不肯透露兵书的下落，夏侯杰决定置他于死地。.

programme.title: 大厨驾到 Chefs On Wheels - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) In the first episode, we are treating the nurses to a feast! They have been working long hours under a stressful environment and dedicating their time to their patients. The production team invited the chefs to design a menu especially for them! The menu includes Mama Leong's Melon Lotus Rib Bone Soup, Forest's Thai Scrimp Salad, Sam's Abalone Vermicelli and Joe's dessert Chocolate Hazelnut Cake! (重)《大厨驾到》第一集要慰劳的对象是白衣天使-护士！护士的工作时间长，压力大，劳心劳力，非常辛苦。制作组特地请大厨团队为他们精心设计菜单，炮制出风味各异的好菜，从而给他们加油打气！大厨们所准备的料理分别是Mama Leong的节瓜雪莲排骨汤、Forest的泰式沙拉烤虾、Sam的鲍鱼面线和Joe的甜品-巧克力榛果蛋糕！.

programme.title: 歌手2018 Singer 2018 - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) This series features a modification to the Challenge rounds, with the Challenger entering the competition starting at the knockout rounds instead of Challenge round (where a new substitute singer would enter the competition instead). Challengers must avoid last place on their first week in addition to finishing in top four on the second week (in a combination of both knockout and challenge rounds) to be declared safe; failing either challenge instantly eliminates the singer from the competition. (重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 旅游陷阱 Holiday Gone Wrong - EP 6
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and English) Holiday Gone Wrong brings viewers through the stories of eight overseas holidays which had gone awry. Through re-enactments and interviews, victims share compelling first-hand accounts of their ordeals - of either being kidnapped, robbed, or scammed of their money and belongings. At the end of each episode, relevant spokespersons will share with viewers various precautionary measures one could take when caught in similar situations. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/英)《旅游陷阱》将通过搬演片段为观众带来惊险旅游故事。受害者也会献身讲述当时的恐怖经历，其中将包括在途中被绑架，打抢及诈骗等。到节目的尾声，专家也会向观众分享如何在遇到类似情况时，采取好防护措施。.

programme.title: 都市狂想 A World Of Difference - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) A World of Difference is an anthology series, which examines current social issues set in a local alternative present, in an imaginative, light hearted manner with a satirical tone. The story is standalone, with a common character who plays the role of an official in the various stories, example a tax officer, an examination official, a labour office clerk etc. He will be the one to explain rules or deliver results to the main protagonists. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)《都市狂想》系列通过大胆设想的背景，富有奇幻色彩的故事，带出与社会相关的课题。各单元故事由不同演员主演，只有一位演员将在所有故事中出现，演绎负责不同工作的小公务员，例如税务官、考官等。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 Hello Taiwan - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) This programme introduces to viewers Taiwan's traditional cuisine and its unique ingredient and spices. (重)介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 新生之旅 Rites Of Motherhood - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) When a baby is born in India, the mothers have to prepare for a series of specific Hindu rituals and customs. Amongst them, the Tamil rite of passage Valaikaapu is celebrated during late pregnancy. The hair-shaving and ear-piercing ceremonies are two other rituals central to Indian culture. (重)印度妇女的安胎礼、宝宝的剃发礼、穿耳洞等，一个个世世代代相传下来的印度生育仪式，洋溢着浓浓的宗教色彩。古老的瑜珈和悉达医疗法更是印度妇女安胎保健的良方。让我们随林翠芳一起探索印度妈妈生儿育女的世界吧！.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 75

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 76
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Yalan tricks Xiaochun into passing the formula of the azalea wine to her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 雅兰从吴春手上拿到酿制杜鹃花酒的加工方法，谎称会以菊熙的名义申请专利，但其实想背着吴春将杜鹃花就占为己有。所幸马陆抢先一步以菊熙的名义申请专利，让雅兰不能得逞。吴春再次对雅兰感到失望。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 21
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Li Ying arranges for the badly wounded Bingyan to recuperate at master Chashan's place. Bingyan is still in coma when Li Ying visits him arousing Li Ying's concern. Jin Xian reveals the plan to elect a new crown prince when he visits the queen and her prince. The queen feels happy secretly. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 重伤的兵沿被李旲安排在茶山先生处养伤。李旲去看他时，他仍在昏迷中, 李旲感到担心。金宪去探望中殿娘娘和大君，话里透出将要重新立世子的消息。中殿娘娘暗自高兴。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 22
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Eunuch Cheng reports to Jin Xian that Li Ying has been poisoned and is dying. He suspects that the poisoning of his mother is similar to his own poisoning. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩) 成内官向金宪禀报世子李旲中毒并奄奄一息的事情，并猜测世子可能活不了多久。淑仪带着咏温公主去东宫看望逐渐恢复的李旲。李旲问淑仪当年自己母后被害死的情景，因为他认为母后中毒和自己中毒的情况相似。.

programme.title: 歌手·当打之年 Singer 2020 - EP 2

programme.title: 爸爸去哪儿 S5 Where Are We Going, Dad? S5 - EP 3
programme.desc: This program features four fathers and one interim father taking their children to rural places and international destinations. programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 67
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Dongzhen cannot forgive Nayan initially, but requests for her to return home as he misses her greatly. Zuodou knows Shengzhu has a tough time working in Seoul. He confesses his love to Shengzhu and they decide to get married. They have a warm wedding in the countryside which all their good friends attend. Shengzhu's mother and brother knows she is very happy when they see her joyful expression. (PG)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩) 好友们知胜珠决定到乡下和作斗生活，都觉得她很有勇气。作斗知胜珠在首尔工作辛苦。他向胜珠告白，俩人决定结婚。他们在乡下办了一场温馨的婚礼，众好友们都来参加了。胜珠的母亲和弟弟见到胜珠开心的表情，知道她很幸福。.

programme.title: 都市狂想 A World Of Difference - EP 3
programme.desc: A World of Difference is an anthology series, which examines current social issues set in a local alternative present, in an imaginative, light hearted manner with a satirical tone. The story is standalone, with a common character who plays the role of an official in the various stories, example a tax officer, an examination official, a labour office clerk etc. He will be the one to explain rules or deliver results to the main protagonists. (PG)《都市狂想》系列通过大胆设想的背景，富有奇幻色彩的故事，带出与社会相关的课题。各单元故事由不同演员主演，只有一位演员将在所有故事中出现，演绎负责不同工作的小公务员，例如税务官、考官等。.

He beat people up and smashed things in the hospital but was eventually stopped by Dr. Jin who advised him to take revenge through substantive measures instead of fury. After achieving top grades, Dongzhu becomes an intern at the Juda hospital in September 2011... Dr. Jin was once a famous surgeon who decided to leave his former workplace for a small hospital. The oddball but genius doctor teaches the meaning of true doctoring to Jiang Dongzhu and Yin Ruizhen, two young doctors who were passionate in their efforts, but only for their own selfish reasons.

programme.title: Doctor Romantic - EP 2
programme.desc: Dongzhu confesses his love to Ruizhen but she rejects him as she already has a sweetheart. After attending her boyfriend's funeral, Ruizhen seeks solace in the mountains where she falls and hurts herself. Dr. Jin chances upon her and rescues her... Dr. Jin was once a famous surgeon who decided to leave his former workplace for a small hospital. The oddball but genius doctor teaches the meaning of true doctoring to Jiang Dongzhu and Yin Ruizhen, two young doctors who were passionate in their efforts, but only for their own selfish reasons.

programme.title: Reka - EP 3
programme.desc: A very trendy yet still very popular design concept which the participants will now need to inject some of their very own creative spins into, especially with the use of old and broken electronic appliances!Host:Khairudin Saharom.

programme.title: Opocot The Movie
programme.desc: Things went wrong 2 years ago with Nadia at her hometown, when she scolded her to be mother-in-law during her engagement cenemony, out of an embarassing latah incident.Her friends are trying to convince her to return home after they found out that her mother has fallen ill. All of them inflicted with latah, they decided to hire Roy as their driver.

programme.title: Kelab JMJ - EP 2
programme.desc: A group of children realise their dreams of becoming online personalities through managing their webshow whilst grappling with personal and-or family issues that can shatter their friendship and aspirations. Kelab JMJ enters a music video competition. Hannah immediately takes charge, wanting everything to be perfect. What she says, goes. However, she doesn’t realise that her actions are too harsh until she hurts one of their friend’s feelings.

programme.title: Romantika Sr 8 - EP 10
programme.desc: A programme that features Malaysia's most popular celebrity couples as they travel to places while they shared their most memorable romantic relationship and love stories exclusively. In this episode, we join singer/actor Haris Baba and his wife as they travel to Western Australia. Let them share with you the historic Busselton Jetty, which opened in 1865 and is one of the longest wooden jetty around.

programme.title: Sentuhan Harapan - EP 1
programme.desc: In Tanzania, people with albinism are believed to be manifestations of evil spirits, and their body parts are perceived to contain magical powers that can be used as medicine or in rituals. Fuelled by deep-rooted fear and superstition, some Tanzanians actively hunt down albinos for their body parts. In Sentuhan Harapan, we uncover the plight and struggles of the forgotten communites around the world. Most importantly, the audience will witness the strength of the human spirit as we follow the exploits of the few brave souls who stood up for these outcast communites.

programme.title: Aziz Istanbul - EP 15
programme.desc: Glorious Istanbul shows Istanbul in all its glory from its oldest streets, alleyways to soaring minarets. Thousands of hours of shooting speaks volumes about the historical capital city that is the Glorious Istanbul. The series will feature 25 interesting places in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Detik 2020-2021 - EP 5
programme.desc: The half hour program analyses and dissect issues of concern to the Malay-Muslim Singaporeans - be it at the community level, national, regional or global. programme.title: Realisasi Job Selebriti - EP 7
programme.desc: Realisasi Job Selebriti is a variety & lifestyle reality show, where the celebrities will have the opportunity to experience his-her dream job or a job that they never thought of doing since they have become a celebrity. All episodes will feature excitement where celebrities need to learn and prepare tasks given related to the dream job and complete the given task spontaneously.

programme.title: Sri Bella - EP 1
programme.desc: A 13-episode lighthearted dramedy about a singing group comprising of middle-aged ladies. Hajah Maimun, the leader of Seri Kenchana, decides to revive Marhaban Group's glory years by recruiting new members and mentor them. The group is renamed Sri Bella, after her granddaughter. After recruitment ends, the Sri Bella group has its first batch of members who comprises of ladies from all walks of life. The Sri Bella members face different challenges and issues as a group.

programme.title: Adat Padat - EP 4
programme.desc: Adat PadatAdat Padat is a a celebrity-centred fun-filled gameshow showcasing Malay culture. Celebrities are put to different tests in order to win the game each week. The winning group wins cash money for the charity organization of their choice.

programme.title: Balik Sekolah - EP 2
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Easy-going Salih was leading a good but simple life, taking charge of his father?s motorworks repair company, getting ready to marry his secondary school sweetheart, and plenty of time to kick back and watch his favourite tv programmes and films as well as strum on his beloved guitar. However, all that came crashing down when his fiancee broke it all off, citing that he was a dead end going nowhere with his life. To make things worse, his father blurts out how disappointed he is with Salih and that sometimes he feels like kicking him out to force him to make something of his life. Determined to prove her wrong, he makes a drastic move to take up the Polytechnic opportunity that he never took all those years ago.

programme.title: Dekatkan Jarak Kita - EP 15
programme.desc: Drama about Sofiya who has to live with her aunt after the death of her p parents. Umi Khadijah does not know that her husband Kamil has an evil intentions against Sofiya. He instigated Tasriq to hate Sofiya. Then one day, Umi Khatijah is shocked when she heard Sofiya missing while swimming in the river. Kifli found Sofiya while fishing and brought her home. He decided to adopt her after she cannot remember her family. Unfortunately, Sofiya has a life-threatening illness. Sofiya and Alysa are best friends. However, Sofiya often falls sick. She is later warded and diagnosed with leukaemia. Unfortunately Sofi dies on the day of Alysa’s wedding. She left behind a letter and few items that she requested Alysa to fulfil.

programme.title: Hak Siapa - EP 4
programme.desc: Syariah law in Singapore today helps to resolve cases, covering different aspects of marriage, divorces, ancillary matters, custody and inheritance for the Muslim community. However, many will instead relate the Syariah law and court as messy, complex, complicated and emotionally draining; a long and tedious process that may impact the children. And because the issues discussed are sensitive, many tend to shy away from sharing their understanding or misunderstanding of the court and its process. Saleha was heartbroken when Ramli told her he wanted to marry a second wife, Nabilah. Nabilah’s father objected to the plan as well. However, Ramli and Nabilah was adamant to get married and tried to find ways to get their union approved.

programme.title: Abang Lori Ohsem - EP 7
programme.desc: For Luqman, all his life he has always wanted to be a pilot. Never did he realise that one day, his ambition will take a drastic change when he becomes a lorry driver instead and his nickname "Abang Lori Ohsem".But his life take a turn when he meets a female pilot and falls for her. Dani's hatred towards Luqman is on full display when he reveals Luqman's true identity to his mother Mira and Nek Wan.Their dreams are shattered when they find out that Luqman is not a pilot but instead just a lorry driver. To add more to his misery, his girlfriend Zia decides to leave him while Datin Ira chases him out of the house.

programme.title: Reka - EP 4
programme.desc: Working from home will never have to be mundane again! Participants are given the challenge to infuse as much recycled textiles possible to their unorthodox home office designs.

programme.title: Mek Gyver - EP 13
programme.desc: Zara is a woman who enjoys doing repairs and will go out of the way to help others whenever they need something repaired - from pipes and computers to cars and farm machinery. Her good friend Aizul runs a repair service and persuades her to work with him. Zara agrees to Aizul's request to earn extra pocket money and to earn money to save a surau. When Izlan opens the same business and asks Zara to join him, she refuses and so the fight begin. To own Zarra, Aizul is willing to collaborate with Izul and Zainal, his fiercest enemy, to come up with an evil plan to destroy Aris. He wants Izul and Zainal to help him to chase Aris out of their village.

The next step is the operation of the house from the usual to being extraordinary. There will be a variety of tips and tricks shared. After that, The Project team redesign the kitchen of Nila’s house by adding some bricks on the wall to make it look more interesting.

programme.title: Manja 5 - EP 10
programme.desc: Maintaining the MANJA branding, the content encompasses guest interviews, fashion, food, games-challenges and more. The format is VT and Live in studio. Each episode carries a specific theme which will thread the segments together. The five key segments are Tamu Minggu Ini (Chat with studio guests), Estetika (Beauty, Styling, Interior Design), Holistik (DIY, Life hacks), Makan Tiub (Food) and Bro-Sis Cuba (Activities). Spotlight (Local Entertainment Highlights will supplement these main segm In the last edition of Manja carries the theme BFF. TMI chats with three Singapore’s actress – Siti Hajar, Siti Aishah and Seriwahyuni who have been BFF since their early involvement in the industry more than 20 years ago. Fashion designer Azni Samdin will share men’s fashion hacks in Holistik. Spotlight performance with two besties Hetty Sarlene and Yanni Bakri. Also, a video chat with three young stars – Nyla Esman, Freda Mel and Hermie Latiff who will helmed the second season of Skuad Cilik.

programme.title: Kampung People - EP 1
programme.desc: The police manages to catch Suhaimi, who has been involved in illegal activities, together with his employee, Razif. However, they are unable to collect enough evidence against him and only Razif is able to help them. Agent Shukri threatens Razif that if he does not cooperate with the police, he may be sentenced to 15 years in prison. Razif works with Mr. Suhaimi who sells smuggled goods. One day, the police raids the office and arrests the both of them. Razif is brought into questioning by Agent Shukri, who informs him that he may be sentenced to 15 years in prison if he refuses to spill any beans. Razif agrees to testify against Mr. Suhaimi's criminal activities In court. With their lives at stake, Agent Shukri places Razif and his family under the Witness Protection Program to protect them from getting killed by "Chengkih Manis" group before the trial begins. Razif's family faces various challenges as they disguise as villagers to adapt to situations in the village.

Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it.

programme.title: Ayah
programme.desc: Story about Yusof who is a very responsible father who takes care of the family after his wife falls sick. He works tirelessly to support his wife high medical bills, children's school bills and the house expenses.

They are the children of Marhanna and her ex-husband, an English man. Cempaka decided to leave the house but her love for Hafiz prevented her from leaving the house. What will happen to them? Zack finds out he is merely a pawn in Ryan’s mission to pay off his debt to Rio. Sofea witnesses an unconscious Borhan being handled by Farouk and informs Zack. As they embark on a journey to Varanasi to fulfil their mother's last wishes, Gautham furtively sets off to look for his runaway sister. Through this sweet treasure, he hopes to discover more about Filipino cuisine, its influences and evolution. 美食博客许安寻访亚洲家传料理厨师，向他们学习制作失传或即将消失的美食。他会为这些传统菜肴加上现代的改良，使它们不仅在历史上和现代都占有一席之地。.

programme.title: Dive Tierra Bomba Dive
programme.desc: A young woman emerges as a leader on her Colombian island to save the reef that’s vital to its survival. A young woman emerges as a leader on her Colombian island to save the reef that’s vital to its survival. She spurs on the islanders to fight back against international shipping threatening their home.

programme.title: Eight-Bit Archaeologists
programme.desc: From cultural education to hardware archival, learn about two stories of preservation in the world of games. Discover two stories of preservation in the world of video games. The game The Forest Song aims to preserve rural Ukranian folklore. Meanwhile, archiving every video game in the world has become Frank Cifaldi's life's work.

programme.title: Encouraged
programme.sub-title: Courage Adams returns home to Nigeria
programme.desc: At age 16 Courage Adams turned pro, taking the BMX world by storm. Now, he returns to his roots in Nigeria. At age 12 Courage Adams started riding BMX, but by age 16 he'd turned pro, taken the BMX world by storm and made the most of his parents' bold move. Now, he returns to his roots in Nigeria.

programme.title: RISS.
programme.sub-title: A film about more love with Carissa Kainani Moore
programme.desc: From director Peter Hamblin, follow surfer Carissa Moore around the 2019 World Surf League Championship Tour. From director Peter Hamblin, follow legendary surfer Carissa Moore around the 2019 World Surf League Championship Tour season as she faces all the ups and downs head on.

programme.title: A Healthy Dose
programme.desc: American rapper GZA ponders the future of medicine: what will technology’s place in medicine be? One of the founding members of the hip-hop group Wu-Tang Clan rapper GZA ponders the future of medicine and technology’s place in medicine. In order to see what’s to come in the field of medicine, he takes a look at how far it’s come.

programme.title: Nature's Way
programme.desc: Host GZA asks whether nature could offer inspiration for scientists the way it has for artists and musicians. The animal world has long been an inspiration to musicians and artists like GZA, of hip-hop group Wu-Tang Clan. Could nature offer inspiration for scientists as well? Could the world’s fastest, most agile creatures help us improve our own mobility?

programme.title: Wanting the win
programme.desc: Toni Cairoli feels the pressure as he prepares to race in his home country at the competition in Trentino. Toni Cairoli feels the pressure as he prepares to race in his home country. With Tim Gaiser's homeland right over the border in Slovenia he also wants the win at the Trentino race.

programme.title: Family support and dedication
programme.desc: Learn the story of how Tom Vialle's family are sharing in his dream for MXGP glory. Tom Vialle is the newest member of the Red Bull KTM Factory Racing team. Learn the story of how his family are sharing in his dream for MXGP glory.

programme.title: The wanderer
programme.desc: Tom Curren recalls how he ended up in France and what the surf life on the French coast has to offer. Tom Curren says that there is always something new to learn about surfing. Curren recalls how he ended up in France and what the surf life in France has to offer.

programme.title: Almost normal
programme.desc: Munich might not seem like it has waves to offer, but there are hidden waves in the midst of the German city. Munich might not seem like it has waves to offer, but Quirin Rohleder, Tao Schirrmacher and Christian Bach share the joy of finding these hidden waves in the midst of Germany's sprawling city.

programme.title: Perspectives
programme.desc: The surf scene in Portugal is growing because locals are showing off what the country's coast has to offer. The surf scene in Portugal is finally growing thanks to locals like CJ and Damien Hobgood, Tiago Pires, Carlos Burle, Maya Gabeira and Vasco Ribeiro, who have shown the world what Portugal's coast has to offer.

programme.title: A Land Shaped by Women
programme.desc: Anne-Flore Marxer and Aline Bock go to Iceland to surf, snowboard and delve into the mindsets of local women. As pro snowboarders who’ve fought for gender parity in their sport, Anne-Flore Marxer and Aline Bock spend winter in Iceland, the UN's number one-ranked nation for gender equality.

programme.title: The Art of Street Fighting
programme.sub-title: One game, one champion, an endless fight
programme.desc: The world's top Street Fighter V players prepare for the fight of their lives at Red Bull Kumite. Go inside the lives of the top Street Fighter V players as they prepare for the biggest fight of their lives. The stories of Xiao Hai, Daigo, Gamerbee, Tokido and Luffy show what it takes to make it to the hallowed grounds of Red Bull Kumite.

programme.title: Karl Meltzer: Made to Be Broken
programme.desc: Ultrarunner Karl Meltzer embarks on his third and final attempt to run the Appalachian Trail in record time. Ultrarunner Karl Meltzer has long dreamed of setting the speed record for crossing the USA's Appalachian Trail. Now he sets out for his third and final attempt to run the 3,524km (2,188 miles) in less than 46 days, 8 hours and 6 minutes.

programme.title: Health Goth
programme.desc: Is it about an aesthetic movement or about movement with an aesthetic? The debate over Health Goth heats up. There is healthy debate over Health Goth. Is it an aesthetic movement inspired by minimalism, cyberpunk and sportswear? Or is it a new kind of gym, where people sweat out their angst all in black? The founders of both sides try to work it out.

programme.title: Gqom
programme.desc: A mesmerising blend of tribal and house music is born in the streets of Durban, South Africa. A dark, hyper blend of tribal music and trance is born in the streets of Durban, South Africa. Made by young producers who create in bedrooms and share the tracks over group texts, Gqom is a viral sound that is infecting dance floors worldwide.

programme.title: Bologna
programme.desc: Hubertus visits Ducati, explores Bologna’s fashion scene, and is inspired by best-kept kitchen secrets. Hubertus is inspired by Italy's best-kept kitchen secrets, like Bologna's famous Ragù alla Bolognese. He visits Ducati to test one of the company's fastest bikes, then he explores Bologna’s fashion scene. See who Hubertus meets along the way!

programme.title: Going back to his roots
programme.desc: Aaron Gwin goes back to his roots in California to talk about his days growing up and riding there. American downhill mountain biker Aaron Gwin revisits his roots in California's Morongo Valley to talk about what it was like growing up in the area. He also takes the opportunity to ride some old trails on a mountain bike and a motocross bike.

programme.title: The spice of life
programme.desc: Aaron Gwin cuts loose with some friends, first on a local DH MTB trail, then at a climbing gym. Aaron Gwin isn’t one to sit around – if there’s something fun to be done, he’s there. After a morning riding a local downhill trail, Aaron cuts loose with some friends at a climbing gym.

programme.title: Training day
programme.desc: Aaron Gwin and enduro champ Richie Rude get a little competitive during a few days of off-season training. Aaron Gwin hosts enduro champion Richie Rude at his home in Southern California and shows Richie his favourite local trails in the surrounding hills. The pair get a little competitive in the gym as Aaron shows Richie his off-season training regimen.
